attributes.action: Include electric car charging for all commercial planning applications
attributes.background: To help the adoption of electric cars, all new commercial planning applications should include charging for electric cars.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You can find out more about current Government guidance on promoting sustainable transport here:

https://www.gov.uk/guidance/national-planning-policy-framework/9-promoting-sustainable-transport

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling for Government guidance that all new homes with parking be installed with an electric car-charging point, if that's what you want to happen.
